mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classAttendance (classSchedule_no, mem_no, total_classes, attended_classes) VALUES (#{classSchedule_no}, #{mem_no}, #{totalClasses}, #{attendedClasses})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM classAttendance WHERE classSchedule_no = #{classSchedule_no} AND mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE classAttendance SET total_classes = #{totalClasses}, attended_classes = #{attendedClasses}, attendance_rate = CASE WHEN total_classes = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (attended_classes / total_classes) * 100 END WHERE classSchedule_no = #{classSchedule_no} AND mem_no = #{mem_no}
